title: Cronies
description: Tammy's world is peppered with bribery, scandal and, generally speaking, people doing the wrong things for bad reasons. Tammy himself frequently skirts the line, and at times he must cross that line if only because no one else is playing fair. In fact, it seems the harder he tries, the more people get killed; yet to stop investigating would be even worse...
author: Adimchinma Ibe
